name: Sempra
0:
”Alexa Ask Sempra Energy how much i owe”
”how much is my bill”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sempra energy
des: The skill is an easy way to point Sempra customers to the billing inquiry number . Alexa will always have the latest phone numbers of the billing and rate departments as well as the latest name of the best rate provider at any given time. WE ARE NOT SEMPRA. THIS IS A FREE SERVICE TO SEMPRA CUSTOMERS
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
